name: Aigent Module 10 - System Orchestration & Manager Dashboard (v1.0)

nodes.name: 1001: Trigger - Schedule
nodes.notes: Runs every 15 minutes (default) to health-check all modules and update dashboard

nodes.name: 1002: Load Configuration
nodes.notes: Loads env vars + optional remote config; generates trace_id for execution tracking

nodes.name: 1003: Environment Validation
nodes.notes: Validates required credentials for enabled modules; produces missing_vars[] for alerts

nodes.name: 1004: Health Checks Framework
nodes.notes: Pings all enabled modules (parallel-safe); determines status: healthy|degraded|down

nodes.name: 1005: Dependency Graph Integrity
nodes.notes: Verifies critical path (01‚Üí02‚Üí03‚Üí04‚Üí05) and compliance paths (06/08‚Üí09)

nodes.name: 1006: KPI Aggregation
nodes.notes: Pulls headline KPIs (24h/7d/30d) from Module 07 Analytics; checks thresholds

nodes.name: 1007: Alert Rules Evaluation
nodes.notes: Aggregates all alerts from env, health, dependencies, and KPIs

nodes.name: 1008: Render Dashboard HTML
nodes.notes: Builds manager_dashboard.html with status tiles, KPIs, alerts, and sparklines

nodes.name: 1009: Publish Dashboard Framework
nodes.notes: Uploads dashboard to S3/Drive; returns signed URL if HIPAA_MODE

nodes.name: 1010: Build Manager Status Response
nodes.notes: Assembles standardized manager_status.json for API/UI consumption

nodes.name: 1011: Notify Alerts Framework
nodes.notes: Prepares Slack + Email alert messages; sends if alerts exist

nodes.name: 1012: Respond - Success
nodes.notes: Returns manager_status.json with dashboard link and system health

nodes.name: 1013: Error Handler
nodes.notes: Catches errors, posts to Compliance (Module 09), returns error response

nodes.name: 1014: Respond - Error
nodes.notes: Returns error response with trace_id for investigation
